name: @js/common
description: Common javascript tools, utilities and other usefull stuff

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run tsc -- -t es2015 --outDir dist/es2015
scripts.postbuild: copyfiles -u 2 dist/src/**/*.* dist && copyfiles -u 2 dist/testing/**/*.* testing && rimraf dist/src dist/dist dist/node_modules dist/testing
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run version:placeholder && npm run version:git
scripts.postpublish: npm run version:placeholder && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build
